title: Remove Caffeine AI watermark and update footer branding

requirements.summary: Remove the 'Built with caffeine.ai' link and branding from the footer component
acceptanceCriteria: The footer no longer displays any reference to caffeine.ai
No 'powered by' or 'built with' attribution links remain visible

file_operations.description: Remove the powered-by link to caffeine.ai and any associated branding elements from the footer component while maintaining the existing component structure

requirements.summary: Update the footer to display only 'LuidCorporation© 2026' as the copyright text
acceptanceCriteria: Footer displays exactly 'LuidCorporation© 2026' with the copyright symbol
The text maintains consistent styling with the current Carbon Black and Neon Green theme
No other branding or text appears in the footer

file_operations.description: Replace all existing footer text with 'LuidCorporation© 2026' and ensure the styling maintains consistency with the Carbon Black and Neon Green color scheme defined in the theme
